{% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class AbstractMethod[source]

AbstractMethod(tokens:Union[str, List[str]], delimiter=' ')

Creates an AbstractMethod from the given tokens, which can be either:

  • a string with tokens delimited by delimiter (defaults to a single space)
  • a list of tokens
{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
method1 = AbstractMethod("private static int METHOD_1 ( ) { return 0 ; }")
method1

'private static int METHOD_1 ( ) { return 0 ; }'
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
method2 = AbstractMethod(["public", "int", "METHOD_2", "(", ")", "{", "return", "1", ";", "}"])
method2

'public int METHOD_2 ( ) { return 1 ; }'
{% endraw %}

Interact with Edit Operations

{% raw %}

AbstractMethod.getEditOperationsTo[source]

AbstractMethod.getEditOperationsTo(other:AbstractMethod)

Returns the minimal list of edit operations which, if applied, would result in the AbstractMethod given by other.

{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
operations = method1.getEditOperationsTo(method2)
operations

[delete token at index 0,
 replace token at index 0 with "public",
 replace token at index 2 with "METHOD_2",
 replace token at index 7 with "1"]
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

AbstractMethod.applyEditOperation[source]

AbstractMethod.applyEditOperation(operation:Union[InsertOperation, DeleteOperation, ReplaceOperation])

Applies the given operation.

{% endraw %}

{% include note.html content='This changes the original AbstractMethod, so you should make a copy if you want to keep the original.' %}

{% raw %}

AbstractMethod.applyEditOperations[source]

AbstractMethod.applyEditOperations(operations:List[Union[InsertOperation, DeleteOperation, ReplaceOperation]])

Applies the given list of operations in order.

{% endraw %}

{% include note.html content='This changes the original AbstractMethod, so you should make a copy if you want to keep the original.' %}

{% raw %} 
method1.applyEditOperations(operations)
method1

'public int METHOD_2 ( ) { return 1 ; }'
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
method2

'public int METHOD_2 ( ) { return 1 ; }'
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
method1 == method2

True
{% endraw %}
